Uses of Class
restlib.RequestBuilder

    Package Description
    restlib  

    • Uses of RequestBuilder in restlib

      Methods in restlib that return RequestBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.addCacheDirective(CacheDirective cacheDirective)
      Adds a cacheDirective to this builder's CacheDirective set.
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.addCacheDirectives(Iterable<CacheDirective> cacheDirectives)
      Adds each CacheDirective to this builder's CacheDirectives set.
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.addCustomHeader(Header header, String value)
      Adds a custom header value to this builder.
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.addExpectation(Expectation expectation)
      Adds a expectation to this builder's Expectation set.
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.addExpectations(Iterable<Expectation> expectations)
      Adds each Expectation to this builder's Expectations set.
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.addPragmaCacheDirective(CacheDirective cacheDirective)
      Adds a cacheDirective to this builder's Pragma CacheDirective set.
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.addPragmaCacheDirectives(Iterable<CacheDirective> cacheDirectives)
      Adds each CacheDirective to this builder's Pragma CacheDirective set.
      static RequestBuilder Request.builder()
      Returns a new RequestBuilder instance.
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.setAuthorizationCredentials(ChallengeMessage credentials)
      Sets this builder's authorization credentials.
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.setConnectionInfo(ConnectionInfo connectionInfo)
      Sets this builder's connection info.
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.setContentInfo(ContentInfo contentInfo)
      Sets this builder's content info.
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.setEntity(Object entity)
      Sets this builder's entity Object.
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.setFrom(EmailAddress from)
      Sets this builder Request sender's email address.
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.setMaxForwards(int maxForwards)
      Sets the maximum number of hops a request produced by this builder can be forwarded.
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.setMethod(Method method)
      Sets this builder's Method.
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.setPreconditions(RequestPreconditions preconditions)
      Sets this builder's RequestPreconditions.
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.setPreferences(ClientPreferences preferences)
      Sets this builder's ClientPreferences.
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.setProxyAuthorizationCredentials(ChallengeMessage credentials)
      Sets this builder's proxy authorization credentials.
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.setReferrer(Uri referrer)
      Sets this builder's referrer.
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.setUri(Uri uri)
      Sets this builder's URI.
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.setUserAgent(UserAgent userAgent)
      Sets this builder's UserAgent.
